frontmatter.title: Axis Replay Website
frontmatter.description: Design and development for a custom Wordpress theme & website, including new branding guidelines for digital media.
frontmatter.lead: Design and development for a custom Wordpress theme and website for AXR Edge (formerly known as Axis Replay). This also included UI mockups and new branding guidelines for digital media, all made in Adobe Illustrator.
